doc:
Les Dawson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Les_Dawson 0 Leslie Dawson Jr. (2 February 1931 – 10 June 1993) was an English comedian, actor, writer, and presenter, who is best remembered for his deadpan style, curmudgeonly persona and jokes about his mother-in-law and wife. Leslie_Dawson_Jr. ( 2_February_1931 – 10_June_1993 ) was an_English_comedian , actor , writer , and presenter , who is_best_remembered for his_deadpan_style , curmudgeonly_persona and jokes about his_mother-in-law_and_wife .
